# Welcome to Johnson & Johnson Python Academy

## Course Information
**Duration:** Self-paced (2-3 hours)
**Target:** Clinical Programming staff (J&J and vendors)
**Goal:** Transform from Clinical Programming Analyst to Advanced Healthcare Data Engineer

---

## Module 1: Welcome & Orientation

### Learning Objectives
By the end of this module, you will:
- Understand the J&J Python Academy mission
- Navigate the learning platform effectively  
- Know your role-specific learning path
- Connect with your cohort and instructors

### Your Learning Platform
- **Moodle LMS:** Course management and assessments
- **JupyterHub:** Interactive programming notebooks
- **Bitbucket:** Version control and collaboration
- **MLflow:** Machine learning experiment tracking

---

## Module 2: Your Learning Path

### Track 1: Junior Clinical Programmer
- Python Fundamentals (20 hours)
- Basic Data Manipulation with Pandas (15 hours)
- Introduction to Clinical Data Standards (10 hours)

### Track 2: Senior Clinical Programmer  
- Advanced Python Programming (25 hours)
- Statistical Analysis with Python (20 hours)
- Automation and Scripting (15 hours)

### Track 3: Lead Clinical Programmer
- System Architecture Design (30 hours)
- Team Leadership in Data Projects (15 hours)
- Advanced MLflow and Model Deployment (20 hours)

---

## Module 3: Getting Started

### Prerequisites Checklist
- [ ] Platform access verified
- [ ] JupyterHub login successful
- [ ] First notebook created
- [ ] Bitbucket account connected
- [ ] Welcome survey completed

### Your First Assignment
1. Complete the "Platform Familiarization" quiz
2. Create your first Jupyter notebook with "Hello, J&J Python Academy!"
3. Introduce yourself in the course forum
4. Schedule your initial mentor meeting

---

## Module 4: Support & Community

### Support Resources
- **Technical Support:** Platform troubleshooting
- **Academic Support:** Course content assistance  
- **Mentorship Program:** One-on-one guidance
- **Office Hours:** Live Q&A sessions

### Connect with Your Cohort
- Course discussion forums
- Weekly virtual coffee sessions
- Peer programming sessions
- Project collaboration groups

---

## Assessment & Next Steps

### Certification Path
- **Foundation Certificate:** Complete Welcome course
- **Intermediate Certificate:** Complete role-specific track
- **Advanced Certificate:** Complete capstone project
- **J&J Clinical Data Engineer:** Full program completion

### What's Next
1. Core Python Fundamentals
2. Healthcare Data with Pandas  
3. Your chosen specialization track

---
